name: Acf-tax
body:
# [Taxonomy add-on for ACF plugin (WP)](https://github.com/FutureMedia/acf-tax) ![Tax icon](http://futuremedia.gr/images/git/tax-icon.png) **Tax** is a simple add-on for the ACF ([Advanced Custom Fields](http://www.advancedcustomfields.com/)) WP plugin that lets you set the taxonomies of a post in a custom metabox. Tax add-on generates elegant lists of check-boxes that can be formated in a number of user selected columns to save space. ##Installation Move the acf-tax.php file in your theme folder. To activate just add 

register_field('Tax_fieldâ€™, dirname(__File__) . '/acf-tax.php');
in your functions file and you're ready to go. ## License Public Domain ![Tax icon](http://futuremedia.gr/images/git/tax-1.png) ![Tax icon](http://futuremedia.gr/images/git/tax-1.png)
